Segment.name: INS
Segment.comment: To provide benefit information on insured entities

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: IndividualRelationshipCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the relationship between two individuals or entities

Field.name: MaintenanceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the specific type of item maintenance

Field.name: MaintenanceReasonCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the reason for the maintenance change

Field.name: BenefitStatusCode
Field.comment: The type of coverage under which benefits are paid

Field.name: MedicareStatusCode
Field.comment: To provide Medicare coverage and associated reason for Medicare eligibility

Field.name: ConsolidatedOmnibusBudgetReconciliationAct
Field.comment: A Qualifying Event is any of the following which results in loss of coverage for a Qualified Beneficiary

Field.name: EmploymentStatusCode
Field.comment: Code showing the general employment status of an employee/claimant

Field.name: StudentStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the student status of the patient if 19 years of age or older, not handicapped and not the insured

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: ConfidentialityCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the access to insured information

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
